Text: Please seed it hasn't moved much in 2 days.
how do i change my resolution in settings?? by the way how do i change anything in setting??
Does it work on windows XP?
after i installed and tryed to run its says i cant cuz i dont have d3dx9_43.dll was not found and just says to re-install i have re-installed 3 times and still doesn't work plz help

I Also had the "Missing d3dx9_43.dll" error. I downloaded that. Then got a "Missing XINPUT1_3.dll" error. Downloaded that also. (both found on dll-files.com) Put those into the main game folder. Then got sometimes saying my hardware wasn't good enough. Ran the "DXSETUP" found in the "Installers" folder. Game works perfectly now. Thanks
Also, if your resolution and other settings arent saving, Run the Settings.exe as Administrator. It worked for me.
the game doesnt work tell me how to install step by step
